rows.label: tlk41400071_02_msg0001
rows.name:
The higher-ups are having a meeting
to end the war, they say.

rows.label: tlk41400071_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But I don't think it will really end
unless the Blades disappear.

rows.label: tlk41400071_02_msg0003
rows.name:
As long as there are Blades,
it's the same as having weapons!

rows.label: tlk41400071_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Down with Blades!
If you want true peace,
you should get rid of Blades, too!
